name: magic-claude-docs
description: Community mirror of Claude Code documentation - search, browse, and view what's new offline

hooks.command: D="$HOME/.claude-code-docs"; if [ -d "${CLAUDE_PLUGIN_ROOT}/docs" ]; then mkdir -p "$D" && touch "$D/.magic-claude-docs-plugin" && rm -rf "$D"/* && cp -R "${CLAUDE_PLUGIN_ROOT}/docs/." "$D/"; fi
